channel.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory
channel.description:
We've all heard of them. What is your favorite conspiracy theory?
I just heard a doozy of one today:
Because British Petroleum says that they're for "green technologies", they rigged the platform in the Gulf of Mexico to blow up to highlight just how bad drilling for oil is.
:fffuuu:
[i]I debated the placement of this topic between here and the Ladies Club. It's more of a Ladies Club thing at first, but I feel that it could quickly turn into a debate, so I placed it in here for that reason. If a mod feels this thread should go in the Ladies Club instead, I have no problems with it being moved.[/i][/SIZE]

item.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory

item.description:

item.description:
Here’s another good one - the Tea Party movement was created by a secretive family of billionaires to push their pro-business agenda:

also lol’d at the mixed metaphor at the end, but it’s pretty scary how few people understand what the Tea Party is.

item.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
MUST be aliens. I mean, they’re going really fucking fast. Do you even know how fast? Look, the one on the right is moving away fast enough to have an obvious red-shift!

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

Come to think of it, the only frame with the vehicle at all in view (1:28) has an awfully sharp nose to be a common jetliner…

No, it doesn’t. On a camera with such a slow framerate, moving objects become distorted.

I’ve never seen car headlights and taillights do that before. Must be aliens. :brow:

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
johnyo:

:hmph: my phone has a better camera.

It’s a surveillance camera, from 2001, bought my government money, it’s not exactly going to be state of the art.

And even if they did have high-speed, hd cameras, why wouldn’t they release a clip showing the plane? (Unless it’s because it’s all part of a conspiracy hurr)

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Chrillen:

The surveillance cameras at the Pentagon should all be $ 2,000, 6000 FPS, high-definition cameras, so that the next time it is hit by a plane there will be no doubt.

johnyo:

I bet there already were and still are. Do you expect them to upload the footage to youtube?.

Chrillen:

Um, they already did.

Chrillen:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pfpx7U_r-4Q

:hmph: my phone has a better camera.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Except, of course, there is a surveillance video (the video is only a frame every second or so) where, on the frame before the first explosion frame, there is a vague blur of a plane (which you’d expect from something traveling several hundred miles per hour). The shape of the blur is wrong for a “rocket” or other some-such nonsense.

9/11 Conspiracy Theories, however, like all conspiracy theories (Barack Obama’s birth certificate, anyone?) thrive on misinformation by those investigating the theories or distortion of actual information when said information is limited by either necessity or just flat out unavailability of information.

“There’s no fluid surveillance video of a plane hitting the Pentagon at 30FPS so therefore, they must be hiding something!”

Or, there was no fluid surveillance video at 30FPS in that area of the Pentagon.

I’ve seen the video of the security gate with the Pentagon in the background. It’s a plane.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite conspiracy theory
item.dc:creator: MysticJ
item.description:
Back to the 9/11 topic:

I checked the 9/11 myths debunking site’s section about Pentagon (https://www.911myths.com/html/pentagon.html), yet I don’t see any chapter about surveilance tapes. I find it hard to believe that a plane crashes into Pentagon, yet the only video we get of it is a 5 frame sequence of totally blurred gray shape passing just above a lawn. Is there any more videos which would show anything?

I mean - the crash into Pentagon happened after both crashes into WTC, right? We have awesome videos of the 2nd plane coming into WTC, yet no video of the Pentagon hit? Or am I missing something?

=================
During the communism era in Czechoslovakia (that’s in the heart of Europe, capital city is Prague, the country is where Jaromir Jagr and Milos Forman are from…), the Party was claiming that one parasitic bug which infests potato fields and eats the leaves on potato plants has been imported into our country by evil Capitalists from Wall Street, who disseminated the bug from airplanes flying over us.
Wonderful piece of propaganda…

Read full topic
